column4: I have a question, I installed xubuntu on a pc thats from 2003 was this the best idea.
Linux mint doesn't run correctly on this machine, I thought xubuntu was the best
I tried puppy dog linux but didn't like it...
I have the debian iso but.. It doesn't seem setup for wifi so I took it off and went to xubuntu 10.4 or something I hope this is correct
Is there a command I can to tell me the details?
pretty decent, though, you could probably take your pick, but if you like Xubuntu there's no particularly reason to stop using it
that's odd, but in the past
